pr_title: Adjust issuer URL in security-jwt guide

timeline.message:
Update security-jwt.adoc

I've updated links with 404 errors

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure about this one tbh but my guess is that we should use some https://example.com/url as using a quarkus.io one is misleading.
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -303,10 +303,10 @@ Create a `security-jwt-quickstart/src/main/resources/application.properties` wit
 [source, properties]
 ----
 mp.jwt.verify.publickey.location=META-INF/resources/publicKey.pem #<1>
-mp.jwt.verify.issuer=https://quarkus.io/using-jwt-rbac #<2>
+mp.jwt.verify.issuer=https://quarkus.io/guides/security-jwt #<2>
 ----
 <1> We are setting public key location to point to a classpath publicKey.pem resource location. We will add this key in part B, <<Adding a Public Key>>.
-<2> We are setting the issuer to the URL string `https://quarkus.io/using-jwt-rbac`.
+<2> We are setting the issuer to the URL string `https://quarkus.io/guides/security-jwt`.

replies.author: sberyozkin

replies.bodyText: @gsmet @sberyozkin How about change the link to https://quarkus.io ?
replies.author: anhldbk

replies.bodyText: @anhldbk IMHO if we are to change it then we need to break the association with quarkus.io completely, as I've said, this value has nothing to do with the quarkus.io
replies.author: sberyozkin

timeline.message:
Update security-jwt.adoc

Update URL for the demo issuer
